subject: Web3
title: Bug Bounty Programs
description: Learn Bug Bounty Programs in one minute.

hook.text: Instead of waiting for hackers, some protocols pay millions to anyone who finds a bug before it's exploited.

buildup.text: Immunefi runs crypto's largest bug bounty platform. Some bounties exceed $10 million for critical vulnerabilities.

discovery.text: A white hat hacker found a bug in Wormhole that could have stolen $10 million. They reported it and received the bounty.

twist.text: Bug bounties create a market for honesty. For many hackers, the legal reward beats the risk of stealing.

climax.text: Crypto bug bounties have prevented billions in potential losses. Paying hackers to be honest is surprisingly effective.

punchline.text: The cheapest way to stop a hack is to pay the hacker to find the bug first.

quiz.question: What do crypto bug bounty programs incentivize?
options: Reporting vulnerabilities for a reward instead of exploiting them
